This website is AudioEye enabled and is being optimized for accessibility. To open the AudioEye Toolbar, press "shift + =". Some assistive technologies may require the use of a passthrough function before this keystroke. For more information, activate the button labeled “Explore your accessibility options”.

# Councilmember Ethan Benson, Position 1

![Councilmember Benson Headshot for website](https://www.snoqualmiewa.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=37572)[Councilmember Benson](mailto:ebenson@snoqualmiewa.gov)  
Position 1  
Term Expires: 12/31/2025

### **Councilmember Service:**

Councilmember Benson was elected to office in November 2021.

### **Service in 2025:**

- Parks &amp; Public Works Committee, Chair
- Parks &amp; Events Commission Council Liaison
